register.name: MIDR
register.description: Provides identification information for the processor, including an implementer code for the device and a device ID number

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number, or major revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number, or minor revision, of the processor

register.name: SCTLR
register.description: Provides the top level control of the system, including its memory system

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: Thumb exception Enable

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Access Flag Enable

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: TEX Remap Enable

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: Nonmaskable FIQ support

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the value of the E bit in the CPSR on an exception

bitField.name: HA
bitField.description: RAZ/WI

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Selects the base address of the exception vectors

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: SWP/SWPB enable bit

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: Enables the MMU

register.name: MPIDR
register.description: Provides an additional processor identification mechanism for scheduling purposes in a multiprocessor system

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Multiprocessing Extensions

bitField.name: ClusterID
bitField.description: Identifies a Cortex-A9 MPCore processor in a system with more than one Cortex-A9 MPCore processor present

bitField.name: CPUID
bitField.description: Indicates the CPU number in the Cortex-A9 MPCore configuration

register.name: ID_PFR0
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set state support and programmers model for the processor

bitField.name: State3
bitField.description: ThumbEE instruction set support

bitField.name: State2
bitField.description: Jazelle extension support

bitField.name: State1
bitField.description: Thumb instruction set support

bitField.name: State0
bitField.description: ARM instruction set support

register.name: ID_PFR1
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set state support and programmers model for the processor

bitField.name: Microcontroller_programmers_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for microcontroller programmer's model.

bitField.name: Security_extensions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions

bitField.name: Programmers_Model
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer's model

register.name: ID_DFR0
register.description: Provides top level information about the debug system for the processor

bitField.name: Debug_model_M_profile
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped debug model for M profile processors

bitField.name: Memory_mapped_trace_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped trace model

bitField.name: Coprocessor_trace_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor-based trace model

bitField.name: Memory_mapped_debug_model_A_R_profiles
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped debug model, for A and R profile processors

bitField.name: Coprocessor_Secure_debug_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor-based Secure debug model

bitField.name: Coprocessor_debug_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor based debug model, for A and R profile processors

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Provides information about the implementation defined features of the processor

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Provides general information about the implemented memory model and memory management support

bitField.name: Innermost_shareability
bitField.description: Indicates the innermost shareability domain implemented

bitField.name: FCSE_support
bitField.description: Indicates whether the implementation includes the FCSE

bitField.name: Auxiliary_registers
bitField.description: Indicates support for Auxiliary registers

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA.

bitField.name: Outer_shareable
bitField.description: Indicates support for outer shareable attribute.

bitField.name: Cache_coherence
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency maintenance.

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Protected Memory System Architecture (PMSA).

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture (VMSA).

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Provides general information about the implemented memory model and memory management support

bitField.name: BTB
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch target buffer.

bitField.name: L1_test_clean_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, Harvard architecture.

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Provides general information about the implemented memory model and memory management support

bitField.name: Hardware_access_flag
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware access flag.

bitField.name: WFI
bitField.description: Indicates support for wait-for-interrupt stalling.

bitField.name: Memory_barrier_features
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations.

bitField.name: Unified_TLB_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_TLB_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_cache_maintenance_range_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_background_prefetch_cache_range_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_foreground_prefetch_cache_range_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Provides general information about the implemented memory model and memory management support

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates support for supersections.

bitField.name: Branch_predictor_maintenance
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by set and way, clean by set and way, and invalidate and clean by set and way.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by MVA, clean by MVA, invalidate and clean by MVA, and invalidate all.

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set supported by the processor

bitField.name: Divide_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for divide instructions.

bitField.name: Debug_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for debug instructions.

bitField.name: Coprocessor_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions. This field reads as zero (RAZ).

bitField.name: Compare_and_branch_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions.

bitField.name: Bitfield_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bitfield instructions.

bitField.name: Bit_count_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions.

bitField.name: Atomic_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set supported by the processor

bitField.name: Jazelle_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle instructions.

bitField.name: Interworking_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for instructions that branch between ARM and Thumb code.

bitField.name: Immediate_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for immediate instructions.

bitField.name: ITE_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for IfThen instructions.

bitField.name: Extend_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions.

bitField.name: Exception_2_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 2 instructions.

bitField.name: Exception_1_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 1 instructions.

bitField.name: Endian_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set supported by the processor

bitField.name: Reversal_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for reversal instructions.

bitField.name: PSR_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for PSR instructions.

bitField.name: Unsigned_multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Signed_multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Interruptible_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions.

bitField.name: Memory_hint_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions.

bitField.name: Load_and_store_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for load and store instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set supported by the processor

bitField.name: Thumb2_executable_environment_extension_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb2 Executable Environment Extension instructions.

bitField.name: NOP_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions.

bitField.name: Thumb_copy_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions.

bitField.name: Table_branch_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions.

bitField.name: Synchronization_primitive_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions.

bitField.name: SVC_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC instructions.

bitField.name: SIMD_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions.

bitField.name: Saturate_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set supported by the processor

bitField.name: Exclusive_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exclusive instructions.

bitField.name: Barrier_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for barrier instructions.

bitField.name: SMC_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for SMC instructions.

bitField.name: Write_back_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for write-back instructions.

bitField.name: With_shift_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for with-shift instructions.

bitField.name: Unprivileged_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Unprivileged instructions.

register.name: AIDR
register.description: Provides implementation-specific ID information

register.name: ACTLR
register.description: Provides implementation-specific configuration and control options

bitField.name: Parity_on
bitField.description: Support for parity checking if implemented

bitField.name: Alloc_in_one_wy
bitField.description: Enable allocation in one cache way only

bitField.name: EXCL
bitField.description: Exclusive cache

bitField.name: SMP
bitField.description: Signals if the Cortex-A9 processor is taking part in coherency or not

bitField.name: WR_full_line_of_zeros_mode
bitField.description: Enable write full line of zeros mode

bitField.name: L1_prefetch_enable
bitField.description: Dside prefetch

bitField.name: L2_prefetch_enable
bitField.description: Prefetch hint enable

bitField.name: FW
bitField.description: Cache and TLB maintenance broadcast

register.name: CPACR
register.description: Controls access to all coprocessors other than CP14 and CP15

bitField.name: ASEDIS
bitField.description: Disable Advanced SIMD Extension functionality

bitField.name: D32DIS
bitField.description: Disable use of D16-D31 of the VFP register file

bitField.name: cp11
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP11 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp10
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP10 coprocessor.

register.name: NSACR
register.description: Defines the Non-secure access permissions to the coprocessors CP0 to CP13

bitField.name: NS_SMP
bitField.description: Determines if the SMP bit of the Auxiliary Control Register is writable in Non-secure state

bitField.name: TL
bitField.description: Determines if lockable translation table entries can be allocated in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: PLE
bitField.description: Determines if an access to PLE registers is permitted in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: NSASEDIS
bitField.description: Disable Non-secure Advanced SIMD Extension functionality

bitField.name: NSD32DIS
bitField.description: Disable the Non-secure use of D16-D31 of the VFP register file

bitField.name: CP11_Acc_permission
bitField.description: Determines permission to access coprocessor 11 in the Non-secure state

bitField.name: CP10_Acc_permission
bitField.description: Determines permission to access coprocessor 10 in the Non-secure state

register.name: SCR
register.description: Defines the configuration of the current security state

bitField.name: nET
bitField.description: Not Early Termination. This bit disables early termination

bitField.name: AW
bitField.description: A bit writable. This bit controls whether the A bit in the CPSR can be modified in Non-secure state

bitField.name: FW
bitField.description: F bit writable. This bit controls whether the F bit in the CPSR can be modified in Non-secure state

bitField.name: EA
bitField.description: External Abort handler. This bit controls which mode handles external aborts

bitField.name: FIQ
bitField.description: FIQ handler. This bit controls which mode the processor enters when a Fast Interrupt (FIQ) is taken

bitField.name: IRQ
bitField.description: IRQ handler. This bit controls which mode the processor enters when an Interrupt (IRQ) is taken

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Non Secure bit. Except when the processor is in Monitor mode, this bit determines the security state of the processor

register.name: SDER
register.description: Controls invasive and non-invasive debug in Secure User mode

bitField.name: SUNIDEN
bitField.description: Secure User Non-Invasive Debug Enable

bitField.name: SUIDEN
bitField.description: Secure User Invasive Debug Enable

register.name: VCR
register.description: Forces an exception regardless of the value of the A, I, or F bits in the CPSR

bitField.name: AMO
bitField.description: Abort Mask Override

bitField.name: IMO
bitField.description: IRQ Mask Override

bitField.name: IFO
bitField.description: FIQ Mask Override

register.name: VIR
register.description: Indicates that there is a virtual interrupt pending

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual Abort Bit

bitField.name: VI
bitField.description: Virtual IRQ Bit

bitField.name: VF
bitField.description: Virtual FIQ Bit

register.name: VBAR
register.description: Provides the exception base address for exceptions that are not handled in Monitor mode

register.name: MVBAR
register.description: Provides the exception base address for all exceptions that are handled in Monitor mode

register.name: ISR
register.description: Shows whether an IRQ, FIQ or external abort is pending

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Indicates when an external abort is pending: 0 = no abort, reset value 1 = abort pending.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Indicates when an IRQ is pending: 0 = no IRQ, reset value 1 = IRQ pending.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates when an FIQ is pending: 0 = no FIQ, reset value 1 = FIQ pending.

register.name: CBAR
register.description: Takes the physical base address value at reset

register_group.name: MMU
register_group.description: Memory Management Unit Control and Configuration

register.name: TLBTR
register.description: Returns the number of lockable entries for the TLB

bitField.name: ILsize
bitField.description: Instruction lockable size specifies the number of instruction TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: DLsize
bitField.description: Data lockable size specifies the number of unified or data TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: TLB_Size
bitField.description: Shows Number of entries in TLB

bitField.name: nU
bitField.description: Unified specifies if the TLB is unified or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs.

register.name: TTBR0
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 0, and information about the memory it occupies

register.name: TTBR1
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 1, and information about the memory it occupies

register.name: TTBCR
register.description: Determines which of the Translation Table Base Registers define the base address for a translation table walk

bitField.name: PD1
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 1. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: PD0
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 0. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

register.name: DACR
register.description: Defines the access permission for each of the sixteen memory domains

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

register.name: DFSR
register.description: holds status information about the last data fault

bitField.name: EXT
bitField.description: External abort type.

bitField.name: WNR
bitField.description: Write not Read Bit. Indicates whether the abort was caused by a write or a read access.

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Fault Status Bits

register.name: IFSR
register.description: holds status information about the last instruction fault

register.name: ADFSR
register.description: Enables the system to return additional implementation defined fault status information

register.name: AIFSR
register.description: Enables the system to return additional implementation defined fault status information

register.name: DFAR
register.description: Holds the MVA of the faulting address that caused a synchronous Data Abort exception

register.name: IFAR
register.description: Holds the MVA of the faulting access that caused a synchronous Prefetch Abort exception

register.name: TLBIALLIS
register.description: Invalidate Entire TLB Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAIS
register.gui_name: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA Inner shareable
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA Inner shareable

register.name: TLBIASIDIS
register.gui_name: Invalidate unified TLB entry by ASID Match Inner shareable
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by ASID Match Inner shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAAIS
register.gui_name: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA all ASID Match Inner shareable
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA all ASID Match Inner shareable

register.name: TLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Unified TLB

register.name: TLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB by MVA

register.name: TLBIASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate unified TLB by ASID Match
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB by ASID Match

register.name: TLBIMVAA
register.gui_name: Invalidate unified TLB by MVA all ASID
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB by MVA all ASID

register.name: PRRR
register.description: Controls, in some cases, the top level mapping of the TEX[0],C, and B memory region attributes

register.name: NMRR
register.description: Provides,in some cases, additional mapping controls for memory regions that are mapped as Normal memory by their entry in the PRRR

register.name: TLBLR
register.description: Data or unified TLB Lockdown

bitField.name: Base
bitField.description: Defines the offset from TLB entry 0 for which entries 0 to base - 1 are locked assuming P equals 1 during a hardware translation table walk.

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Places the TLB entry in the lockdown region at the entry specified by the victim, in the range 0 to 3.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Determines if the victim counter dictates the lockdown region, or set-associative region is used

register.name: FCSEIDR
register.description: identifies the current Process ID for the Fast Context Switch Extension

bitField.name: FCSE_PID
bitField.description: Holds the ProcID. Identifies a specific process for fast context switch. The reset value is 0. The purpose of the FCSE PID Register is to provide the ProcID for fast context switch memory mappings. The MMU uses the contents of this register to map memory addresses in the range 0-32MB.

register.name: CONTEXTIDR
register.description: identifies the current Process Identifier and Address Space Identifier

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process. The reset value is 0.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID. The reset value is 0.

register.name: TPIDRURW
register.description: User Read/Write Thread ID

register.name: TPIDRURO
register.description: User Read-only Thread ID

register.name: TPIDRPRW
register.description: Privileged Only Thread ID

register.name: LTLBAR
register.description: Lockdown TLB attributes

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Non-secure description.

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Domain number of the TLB entry.

bitField.name: XN
bitField.description: Execute Never attribute

bitField.name: TEX
bitField.description: Region type encoding.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shared Attribute

register.name: LTLBVAR
register.description: Lockdown TLB VA

bitField.name: VPN
bitField.description: Bits of the virtual page number that are not translated as part of the page table translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Non-secure description.

bitField.name: Process
bitField.description: Memory space identifier.

register.name: LTLBPAR
register.description: Lockdown TLB PA

bitField.name: PPN
bitField.description: Bits of the physical page number that are not translated as part of the page table translation

bitField.name: Region_Size
bitField.description: Region Size

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Value bit

register.name: SLTLBER
register.gui_name: Select Lockdown TLB Entry for Read
register.description: Select Lockdown TLB Entry for Read

bitField.name: Index
bitField.description: Selects the entry that the data read by a read Lockdown TLB VA/PA/attributes operations are coming from.

register.name: SLTLBEW
register.gui_name: Select Lockdown TLB Entry for Write
register.description: Select Lockdown TLB Entry for Write

bitField.name: Index
bitField.description: select the entry that the data write Lockdown TLB VA/PA/attributes data are written to.

register.name: CTR
register.description: Provides information about the architecture of the caches

bitField.name: Cache_writeback_granule
bitField.description: Log2 of the number of words of the maximum size of memory that can be overwritten as a result of the eviction of a cache entry that has ad a memory location within it modified.

bitField.name: DMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 data cache.

bitField.name: IMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 instruction cache.

register.name: CCSIDR
register.description: Selects the current CCSIDR

bitField.name: WT
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-through.

bitField.name: WB
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-back.

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for read allocation.

bitField.name: WA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write allocation.

bitField.name: NumSets
bitField.description: Indicates number of sets - 1.

bitField.name: Associativity
bitField.description: Indicates number of ways - 1.

bitField.name: LineSize
bitField.description: Indicates (log2(number of words in cache line)) - 2.

register.name: CSSELR
register.description: Cache Size Selection

bitField.name: Level_Cache_level_selected
bitField.description: Cache level selected

bitField.name: InD
bitField.description: Instruction or Data/Unified.

register.name: CLIDR
register.description: Cache Level ID

bitField.name: LoU
bitField.description: Level of unification

bitField.name: LoC
bitField.description: Level of coherency

bitField.name: LoUIS
bitField.description: Level of Unification Inner Shareable for the cache hierarchy,

bitField.name: CL_7
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 7

bitField.name: CL_6
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 6

bitField.name: CL_5
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 5

bitField.name: CL_4
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 4

bitField.name: CL_3
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 3

bitField.name: CL_2
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 2

bitField.name: CL_1
bitField.description: Indicates separate instruction and data cache at CL 1

register.name: ICIALLU
register.gui_name: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU

register.name: ICIMVAU
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache by MVA

register.name: BPIALL
register.description: Flush entire branch predictor array

register.name: DCCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate data cache line by MVA
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data cache line by MVA

register.name: DCISW
register.gui_name: Invalidate data cache line by set/way
register.description: Invalidate data cache line by set/way

register.name: DCCMVAC
register.gui_name: Clean data cache line by MVA
register.description: Clean data cache line by MVA

register.name: DCCSW
register.gui_name: Clean data cache line by set/way
register.description: Clean data cache line by set/way

register.name: DCCMVAU
register.gui_name: Clean unified cache line by MVA
register.description: Clean unified cache line by MVA

register.name: DCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Invalidate data cache line by MVA
register.description: Invalidate data cache line by MVA

register.name: DCCISW
register.gui_name: Clean and invalidate data cache line by set/way
register.description: Clean and invalidate data cache line by set/way

register.name: ICIALLUIS
register.gui_name: Invalidate entire instruction cache Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate entire instruction cache Inner Shareable

register.name: BPIALLIS
register.gui_name: Invalidate entire branch predictor array Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate entire branch predictor array Inner Shareable

register_group.name: VAtoPA
register_group.description: Virtual Address to Physical Address Translation

register.name: PAR
register.description: Receives the PA during any VA to PA translation

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table.

bitField.name: SH
bitField.description: Indicates shareable memory: 0 = nonshared 1 = shared.

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection.

bitField.name: DFSR
bitField.description: Holds the FSR bits for the aborted address.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates that the translation succeeded.

register.name: V2PCWPR
register.gui_name: Current World Privileged Read VA to PA translation
register.description: Current World Privileged Read VA to PA translation

register.name: V2PCWPW
register.gui_name: Current World Privileged Write VA to PA translation
register.description: Current World Privileged Write VA to PA translation

register.name: V2PCWUR
register.gui_name: Current World User Read VA to PA translation
register.description: Current World User Read VA to PA translation

register.name: V2PCWUW
register.gui_name: Current World User Write VA to PA translation
register.description: Current World User Write VA to PA translation

register.name: V2POWPR
register.gui_name: Other World Privileged Read VA to PA translation
register.description: Other World Privileged Read VA to PA translation

register.name: V2POWPW
register.gui_name: Other World Privileged Write VA to PA translation
register.description: Other World Privileged Write VA to PA translation

register.name: V2POWUR
register.gui_name: Other World User Read VA to PA translation
register.description: Other World User Read VA to PA translation

register.name: V2POWUW
register.gui_name: Other World User Write VA to PA translation
register.description: Other World User Write VA to PA translation

register.name: PMCR
register.description: Provides details of the performance monitor implementation and configures and controls the counters

bitField.name: IMP
bitField.description: Specifies the implementor code.

bitField.name: IDCODE
bitField.description: Specifies the identification code.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the number of counters implemented.

bitField.name: DP
bitField.description: Disables cycle counter, CCNT, when non-invasive debug is prohibited.

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enables export of the events from the event bus to an external monitoring block, such as the ETM to trace events.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Cycle count divider: 0 = counts every processor clock cycle.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets cycle counter, CCNT, to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Performance counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets all performance counters to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enable bit: 0 = disables all counters, including CCNT 1 = enables all counters including CCNT.

register.name: PMCNTENSET
register.description: Used to enable the Cycle Count Register and any implemented event counters

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Enable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Enable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Enable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Enable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Enable Counter 0.

register.name: PMCNTENCLR
register.description: Used to disable the Cycle Count Register any implemented event counters

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Disable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Disable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Disable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Disable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Disable Counter 0.

register.name: PMOVSR
register.description: Holds the state of the overflow flags for the Cycle Count Register and each of the implemented event counters

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter overflow flag.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Counter 3 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Counter 2 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Counter 1 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Counter 0 overflow flag.

register.name: PMSWINC
register.description: Increments a counter that is configured to count the Software count event

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Increment Counter 3

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Increment Counter 2

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Increment Counter 1

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Increment Counter 0

register.name: PMSELR
register.description: Selects the current event counter when a particular event counter is selected

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Counter select.

register.name: PMCCNTR
register.description: Counts processor clock cycles

register.name: PMXEVTYPER
register.description: Configures which event increments the current event counter or reads the current configuration

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Specifies the event selected.

register.name: PMXEVCNTR
register.description: Used to read or write the value of the current event counter

register.name: PMUSERENR
register.description: User enable register

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: User mode enable

register.name: PMINTENSET
register.description: Enables the generation of interrupt requests on overflows from the Cycle Count Register and each implemented event counter

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable.

register.name: PMINTENCLR
register.description: Disables the generation of interrupt requests on overflows from the Cycle Count Register and each implemented event counter

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable.

register.name: PLEIDR
register.description: Indicates whether the PLE is present or not and the size of its FIFO.

bitField.name: FIFO_Size
bitField.description: PLE's FIFO size

bitField.name: PLE_Available
bitField.description: indicates whether the Preload Engine is present in the given configuration or not

register.name: PLEASR
register.description: Indicates whether the PLE engine is currently active

bitField.name: R
bitField.description: PLE Channel running

register.name: PLEFSR
register.description: Indicates how many entries remain available in the PLE FIFO

bitField.name: Available_entries
bitField.description: Number of available entries in the PLE FIFO

register.name: PLEUAR
register.description: Controls whether PLE operations are available in User mode

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: User accessibility

register.name: PLEPCR
register.description: Contains PLE control parameters, available only in Privilege modes, to limit the issuing rate and transfer size of the PLE

bitField.name: Block_size_Mask
bitField.description: The transferred block size is: (Block size) AND (Block size mask).

bitField.name: Block_number_mask
bitField.description: The transferred block number is: (Block number) AND (Block number mask).

bitField.name: wait_states
bitField.description: PLE wait states specifies the number of cycles inserted between two PLD requests performed by the PLE engine.

register_group.name: TCM
register_group.description: Tightly Coupled Memory Configuration and Control

register.name: TCMTR
register.description: Provides information about the implementation of the TCM
